schedule.title: Course Introduction
schedule.desc: Why students would take this course? What will be covered and how we learn it? We will also go over course logistics.

schedule.title: HTML
schedule.desc: What skills do we need for visualization development for the web? This lab will introduce HTML & CSS, the most basic building blocks for creating a web page.

readings.title: HTML Tutorial (Introduction, Basic, Elements, Attributes, Blocks, File Paths, Head)
